mapper.insert: insert into sys_data_struct_node_attribute (struct_code, node_code, attribute_code, attribute_value) values (#{struct_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{node_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select struct_code, node_code, attribute_code, attribute_value from sys_data_struct_node_attribute
